ModMetaData.name: Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod v2.5
ModMetaData.author: QuantumX
ModMetaData.description:
Warhammer 40k Astra Militarum Imperial Guard Core Mod
Core Mod to add the Astra Militarum (Imperial Guard) into Rimworld.
Mod Consists of Custom Armor, Weapons, Production, Terrain and Architecture.
Rimworld V1.5 Version
LICENSE: You are hereby encouraged to learn from my mod or addon mods for your own personal use. But, ask permission before uploading any of my content.
